name: TechThat
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This Alexa Skill is based on TechCrunch which is an American online publisher of technology industry news founded in 2005. It reports on the business of tech, tech news, analysis of emerging trends in tech, and profiling of new tech businesses and products.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
